skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "Onwards, Sons of the Empire", while this Mount is equipped, for Melee Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Pegasus
skillTree.description: "Make sure those saddle straps are tight, boy, this isn't like falling off a normal horse."

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "No Pity, No Remorse", while this Mount is equipped, for Outrider, Pistolier, War Wagon, and Demigryph units
	(all units in army)
Charge bonus: +10% on Imperial Pegasus mount
Charge bonus: +10% on Imperial Pegasus mount

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Demigryph
skillTree.description: Rigorously trained and fiercely loyal in battle, Imperial Demigryphs are a considerable force on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Regal
backgroundSkills.description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.

backgroundSkills.name: Noble
backgroundSkills.description: "The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -25% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperious
backgroundSkills.description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Tracker
backgroundSkills.description: "If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Hunter
backgroundSkills.description: The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
